General.Name: Cannabusiness Group
General.Description: The CannaBusiness Group, Inc. operates as a real estate acquisition, leasing, and management company focusing on zoning issues in the United States. The company acquires commercial property or land, and leases out the facilities for customers in the agricultural, industrial, commercial, and retail sectors. It also acquires, leases, and manages a portfolio of properties. The company was formerly known as Muscle Warfare International, Inc. and changed its name to The CannaBusiness Group, Inc. in February 2014. The CannaBusiness Group, Inc. was founded in 1985 and is based in Mission Viejo, California.
General.Address: 27758 Santa Margarita Parkway, Mission Viejo, CA, United States, 92691
